articles.author: Science X
articles.title: New study shows volcanism 56 million years ago released more methane than thought - Phys.org
articles.description: About 55 million years ago, the Atlantic Ocean was born. Until then, Europe and America were connected. As the continents began to move apart, the Earth's crust between them ruptured, releasing large volumes of magma. This rift volcanism has led to the format…
articles.content: HTVCs on the mid-Norwegian margin. a, Structural elements. Purple colors, extrusive volcanic elements related to continental break-up; green colors, Cretaceous basins; black dots, hydrothermal vents;… [+5745 chars]
